data.going: Standard to Slow - ABANDONED DUE TO HEAVY SNOW
data.weather: Now snowing heavily and forecast to continue all day.
data.other: The track was ameliorated to a depth of 100mm on Monday. We will now compress it back to try and achieve Standard going but it may ride on the slow side, for a period of time. Tuesday is forecast to be overcast & dry with a gentle breeze. +7C.
